name: Sumatra: Fate of Yandi - Collector's Edition
detailed_description:
The Sumatra: Fate of Yandi Collector's Edition contains a downloadable art book, the full soundtrack and a short bonus game!

Art book

29 page art book, featuring art used in the game as well as many original drawings inspired by the characters and setting of Sumatra: Fate of Yandi.

Bonus game! PENDEK

The original gamejam game, Pendek, that would later be remade and expanded into Sumatra: Fate of Yandi. A short 15-30 minute point and click adventure - we recommend you finish Sumatra: Fate of Yandi first!

The official soundtrack

The full official soundtrack for Sumatra: Fate of Yandi by John Inch.

Featuring 30 tracks of original music! All tracks are in MP3 format. 82 minutes total.

1. Sumatra: Fate of Yandi Theme (5:16)
2. One Faces Many Trials (1:44)
3. Where Am I? (2:03)
4. Atmosphere at Dawn (7:28)
5. Dangers of our World (0:52)
6. You, Me, Where, Here? (0:34)
7. I'm Calm Now (2:48)
8. I Feel This Place (1:12)
9. Life Feels Calm Here (0:32)
10. Panic (0:27)
11. Let Me Think of You Once More (5:46)
12. Awe and Wonder (2:16)
13. This is My Journey Now (2:33)
14. Bukit Licin (1:42)
15. Cheek in the Jungle (2:07)
16. Gone But Not Forgotten (3:12)
17. Just Drifting Through Life (3:01)
18. Lost in Thought (6:21)
19. Flashback to a Better Time (1:35)
20. Tread Carefully, My Friend (2:24)
21. Bells of Fate (1:50)
22. Morning Dawn (3.48)
23. I Think I Feel Better Now (1:26)
24. Trip (0:48)
25. Scour The Abyss (3:44)
26. Disturbed Focus (0:38)
27. Slumber and Reflections (2:50)
28. Spirit of Yandi (2:08)
29. Sumatra: Fate of Yandi Theme (Alternate v.1) (5:36)
30. Sumatra: Fate of Yandi Theme (Alternate v.2) (5:15)

The files will be installed locally in your Sumatra: Fate of Yandi folder within the Steam folder, for example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Sumatra Fate of Yandi\Sumatra Fate of Yandi Collector's Edition

short_description: The Sumatra: Fate of Yandi Collector's Edition contains a downloadable art book, the full soundtrack and a short bonus game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 500 MHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
